Name: Reclining jackal
Description: The jackal is shown reclining on the lid of a shrine, which is now lost. In this capacity he is responsible for the tomb equipment.The form and role of the god Anubis in his manifestation as a funerary god may have been connected with the way of life of jackals, foxes and wild dogs, which live in dens in the desert mountains and regularly roam the necropolis areas at the edges of the desert.
